input_text:
Job Title: Software Engineer

Location: Huntsville, AL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Description

GBSAA Elevator Pitches to Stakeholders:New Engineer: A system that uses a variety of sensor inputs to create an air picture to allow safe operation of UAVs in national air space. Providing situational awareness and maneuver recommendations. It runs on a series of single board computers that communicate over ethernet and provide a display to the operator. Congressional Staffer: GBSAA is a system that saves lives and money. - Provides safe separation from manned/passenger aircrafts - Allows drone pilots to operate in US national airspace - Allows pilots more training time and more pilots to be trained UAS Operator: GBSAA is a system designed to provide an essential level of safety for an UAS operator, allowing them to avoid other aircraft by providing information on intruders in a NAS airspace. Software Engineer (Ground-Based Sense and Avoid Program) Kutta Technologies is seeking a talented Software Engineer with 3 years of experience to join the Test Group for our Ground-Based Sense and Avoid Program. In this role, you will be responsible for developing, testing, and maintaining software that enables unmanned aerial systems (UAS) to detect and avoid obstacles in their flight path. Responsibilities:

 Write scripts in Python to automate testing and analysis tasks. Develop, execute, and maintain test cases to ensure software quality and reliability. Use Git and GitLab for version control, code review, and continuous integration. Collaborate with the software development team to design, implement, and maintain C++ code for the Ground-Based Sense and Avoid Program. Work with stakeholders to understand requirements, identify issues, and propose solutions. Contribute to software architecture and design discussions. Continuously learn new technologies and tools to improve the software development process. What's the day-to-day like? We use Gitlab for issue tracker system. They'll be issued tickets and work through them. We have a hands-off management style, where we let technical people get deep into the work. There are limited meetings and communication unless needed. They'll be updating python code, logging into test spent, running on to special hardware, checking results onto what was tested. Primarily will be on the test team ,but can jump around to other teams as needed.

Skills

c++, software engineering, linux, unmanned

Top Skills Details

c++,software engineering,linux,unmanned

Additional Skills & Qualifications

NICE

 Experience with Git for version control. Familiarity with software testing methodologies and tools. Experience in the aerospace industry or with UAS is a plus. Experience with DO-178C software development standards and certification processes.

Experience Level

Intermediate Level

About Actalent

Actalent is a global leader in engineering and sciences services and talent solutions. We help visionary companies advance their engineering and science initiatives through access to specialized experts who drive scale, innovation and speed to market. With a network of almost 30,000 consultants and more than 4,500 clients across the U.S., Canada, Asia and Europe, Actalent serves many of the Fortune 500.

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

At Actalent, Diversity And Inclusion Are a Bridge Towards The Equity And Success Of Our People. DE&I Are Embedded Into Our Culture Through

Hiring diverse talentMaintaining an inclusive environment through persistent self-reflectionBuilding a culture of care, engagement, and recognition with clear outcomesEnsuring growth opportunities for our people

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regard to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

If you would like to request a reasonable accommodation, such as the modification or adjustment of the job application process or interviewing process due to a disability, please email actalentaccommodation@actalentservices.com for other accommodation options.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
